name: JUST HOOPS
abstract: Take the live-action of arcade basketball into your living room with the first-ever reality-simulated shoot-the-hoop game!

detail.app_languages: Korean, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
JUST HOOPS - BIG UPDATE
=======================

- Improve online challenges
- Rename challenges to Series
- Improve display of coins per level
- Online multiplayer 1vs1
- Online private room up to 4 players
- Cross play PICO 3/4 vs QUEST 2/PRO
- Background matchmaking while playing solo
- Fast menu & shiny multiplayer room
- Ready Player Me Avatars
- Color passthrough on PICO4!
- fix: PICO 4 controller image in tutorial
- fix: point to Playfab production servers
- fix: haptic feedbacks back
- fix: online challenges selection
- fix: background matchmaking cooldown

---
version 1.4.543#e2187e2
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
